Posts.Content: Jan 20, 2011 09:48PM - edited Jan 20, 2011 09:48PM by tpetrone hello, i am new here and i got some bad news today, they found something in my left breast and i am set up to have a biopsy..i meet with the surgeon on the 27th of this month, i am so scared, i think its just a consolation then they make the appt for the biopsy. i dont feel a knot but the took alot of pictures today as well as an ultra sound,breast cancer does not run in our family except for my uncle he did have it and passed, i am soo worried i am afraid its cancer,it is showing noduler density but something is there and they are very concerned, this is all i can think about i cant sleep eat, i have a 9 year old i have to take care of and i am even finding this difficult, please has anyone had noduler density,biopsy and came back normal?oh and i am 45.thank you for listening.
Posts.Title: Too scared to get biopsy... Luca33 Luca33

Posts.Content: Jan 26, 2011 05:32PM tpetrone wrote: hi Carcharm,no i didn't ask,he was just like this is what i took out of you and this is the spot i am concerned about, scared me to death i hope its nothing i will find out tomorrow.plz then i had to go get a couple more mammos and they let me see the staple thats inside me now, that was pretty cool, it will always be there unlsee i have to have my breast removed, which i will do if i have cancer, i will NEVER go through this scare again if i can prevent it.i have a nine yr old little girl to raise, shes way more important than my breast:-)pray for me, thank you
Posts.Title: i am soooo scared! tpetrone Sandeeonherown

Posts.Content: tpetrone wrote: i had my left breast biopsied yesterday,its a 5 mm mass really small bout a pea size  and the surgeon said he thinks he got it all, it didnt hurt at all just a little uncomfortable..he showed me< which i really didn't wanna see> what he took out,it was gross, kinda looks like a raw meat, yuk,but he showed me one part he was concerned about and it had a dark little tiny black spot in it,i am so scared and praying its not cancer, i am going through menopause as i had a hysto last year<not cancer related though>and they took everything, now i am afraid there gonna have to take my breast!!please say a prayer i get the results tomorrow at 2.00 i have to be in his office to get them he says he makes all his patience go to his office..oh and he did tell my husband theres a good chance its benign but i think he was just trying to make him calm. Posts.Content: Jan 26, 2011 05:45PM tpetrone wrote: hi Immarybell, i asked him if it looked like cancer or did he think it was cancer and he would tell me NOTHING, he said he had to wait for the path report. he did a stereotactic biopsy on me he said he thought he got it all i am praying its benign.he didnt even tell me if he suspected it was  he did however tell my husband that there was a good chance that it was benign,but didnt tell me that just that he didnt know.i am so panicky he prob didnt wanna get my hopes up then it turn out to be cancer ,,i just dont know.
